entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 5.
